content.p: Prospective students who are interested in the courses offered by the School of Pharmacy could opt to join the Foundation in Science programme at the University of Nottingham Malaysia that allows seamless entry and transfer to their course of choice, subject to meeting course entry requirements. Bachelor of Pharmacy (Honours) Bachelor of Science (Honours) in Pharmaceutical and Health Sciences Bachelor of Science (Honours) in Biomedical Science Master of Pharmacy (Honours) The Foundation in Science programme serves as a direct entry route to our programmes. More information on pursuing a MPhil or Ph.D. research degree at the School of Pharmacy telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8018
